name: SketchWorld
description:
Hey! Thanks for checking out my game! I (solo) developed this for the blackthornprod game jam #3. The theme was: "less is more".  The way that i interpreted this theme was by doing less of the stuff i am bad at like art, and more of the stuff i'm good at like programming. I also wanted to learn a lot of new things. So i animated sketches and i wanted to make a metroidvania-like game with different area's and unlocks and dialog and more and more and more.

I spend a lot of time on this. This is my first ever released game (i did some game making in the past but never released something). I learned ALOT in this week :D

Features:

  1. Animated sketches
  2. 4 area's where you have to rescue your friends
  3. Multiple route's to take
  4. Epic boss fight
  5. All music & sound effects made by me and my guitar
  6. Dialog

Cheers!
